1141500.name: Fantasy Grounds - Protomen of the Black Bog Post-Apocalyptic Savage Tale (SWADE)
1141500.description:
Protomen of the Black Bog Post-Apocalyptic Savage Tale

Almost a century after the old world ended...
They came from the depths of the Black Bog, faceless, unstoppable, killing and kidnapping for some sinister purpose--the Protomen! No one can help Bogsburg's people besides your heroes.
What terrors await within the Black Bog?
Protomen of the Black Bogis a post-apocalyptic adventure for four to six heroes of Novice Rank. Create characters using the usual method in
Savage Worlds, and consult the Setting Rules sidebar within for a few post-apocalyptic advantages survivors might choose.
The heroes are assumed to be residents or frequent visitors to the small settlement of Bogsburg.
Protomen of the Black Bogis a Savage Tale for the
Savage Worldsroleplaying game system. A copy of
Savage WorldsAdventure Edition is optimal.
Adapted for Fantasy Grounds by: Kevin Doswell
Requires: The free Fantasy Grounds virtual tabletop (VTT) software and a one time purchase of the Savage Worlds Adventure Edition ruleset.
Screenshots may differ from what you see in-game based on the extension and ruleset you have loaded.
